title: Living with John Fahey aka A Room Full of Flowers
itunes:title: Living with John Fahey aka A Room Full of Flowers
description: John Fahey’s guitar playing influenced the sound of the American underground for generations. But how does that legacy change when you hear from three of the women who knew him best?
itunes:summary: John Fahey’s guitar playing influenced the sound of the American underground for generations. But how does that legacy change when you hear from three of the women who knew him best?
